title: Tell us about the name origins of local parks.  I\'ve recently moved close to Halyburton Park and when I mentioned bike riding there, my mother (93 yrs old) told me quite a story of meeting world explorer Halyburton during her college years at Duke. Is our park named for him?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4048
